attributes.action: in the light of both Tibet and Burma, to withdraw all possible British participation in the Peking Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Not only does Peking support the barbaric dictatorship in Burma, but Peking has ruled Tibet by fear, in an illegal occupation spanning over half a century.  The IOC should not even have considered China as Olympic host.  Tibet would have made far more sense.

If most countries pull out at this late stage it will mean financial ruin for Peking.  A golden opportunity to rectify so much misery in Eastern Asia.

We owe it to all the Tibetan, Burmese, and Chinese victims, past, present, and future!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
